name: Mother Dearest 2022
description:
High Concept/Description
A pixelated horror puzzle game that depicts of 2 players - the Polly
(alive twin) and Aeris (Ghost twin) their objective is to get out of the
victorian style mansion that their mother owns because she is evil and has
a vendetta against Polly, to escape the mansion they have to solve a
series of puzzles to get from room to room.
Controls
WASD for the Alive Twin and Up Down Right Left arrow keys for the Ghost
Twin
Credits:
William F. - Made scripts for rat dialogue, door opening, item pick up and
placement, implemented art and sound assets into level
Dane H. - Made scripts for the chandelier, edited the camera script,
created the base level.
Hayden P: Bedside table, rat, tile palette, bookshelf, final painting
Raashee N: chandelier, painting base, bed, bed bounce, title screen, logo
Emi H: Character designs, character animations, trophey, flower, level
complete button, level defeat button
